oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this talk we surveyed Smart Camera Networks including the prototype sensors designed and developed at the Signals and Images Lab of CNR-ISTI. Their possible applications to traffic flow analysis and parking slot monitoring have been envisaged in the framework of the Smart Campus initiative which aims at deploying innovative solutions for smart cities inside the Pisa campus of the National Research Council.
